name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer

reviews.name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer
reviews.reviewText: This printer steps up my business image. It is affordable, has a higher resolution than average (sharper color prints), handles heavier stock (great for presentation covers), and fast. Small print jobs can now be done in house at a lower cost than sending out to print. The cartridges are expensive but the life span (number of pages) is much better. My company provides employee benefits and we set high standards of performance to our clients. The HP printer delivers for us.
reviews.title: Great Color Printer for a Small Business

reviews.name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer
reviews.reviewText: Excellent printer. Easy to set up. Easy to use. Prints quickly. No problems.
reviews.title: Excellent printer

reviews.name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a HP 2605dn. Quick delivery. Ordered on a Saturday night and received it Wednesday. Easy install. Works great.
reviews.title: Works Great

reviews.name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer
reviews.reviewText: Easy to order and delivered promptly. Very simple to hook into the network. Truly awe-inspiring performance. Very clear prints at lightning speeds. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Excellent Printer

reviews.name: HP Color LaserJet Enterprise CP4025dn Printer
reviews.reviewText:
Very fast and consistent printer, very fast and impressing duplexing, very nice driver. Prints are high quality. Unbelievable performance of this printer in general. Totally worth the money their are no negatives, except for it's pretty loud, but not too loud. Pretty large printer too.
I use this printer for high volume color 2-sided jobs. And their have been no problems.
reviews.title: Commercial Machine
